Summary: Older facility but clean. Paid extra for a whirlpool tub in the room only to find it wasn't anything like the pictures. It was a bathtub with whirlpool jets in it. Very disappointing. Room was large and clean, and the breakfast was good. Staff was friendly and professional.
Excellent from the greeting through my departure...except, the internal mechanism that redirects water from the hand-held shower head to the permanent shower head is mal-functioning...Room 227.

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay & Wonderful Team of Employees
Summary: I've stayed at this Super 8 for 5-6 months, while in between hospital stays each month. This is a very nice place to stay for numerous reasons. Edgar Cobain the Manager and his team, Irvin, William & Javier are all so kind and professional. They have a great breakfast. Not just orange juice and a muffin. A very nice brakefast waffles, fruit, cinnimon buns and more. Also @ dinner time they have wine and munches. I can't say enough nice things about Edgar & his team. Elizabeth, is excllent, as well as all the housekeeping staff.  She's always there for anything you need. The pool & jacuzzi? Awesome. Salt water heated pool. Your skin feels really soft when you get out. The rooms are very clean. They have different types of rooms to please everyone. They take excellent care of their
. room had tv, cofffemaker, frige, good size room with table and lounge chair. might have had bedugs. i woke up scratching.

This is my 2nd visit to this property. The first time I stayed was not at all pleasant. Our room was much cleaner then last time however I still feel the owners could make many inexpensive improvements. The lamp shades are old and stained, the dark heavy curtains too. The blankets are so worn I don't think it's even possible to wash them for fear of falling apart. There was a hole in the ceiling in the bathroom area as well as stains on the wall. All easy fixes. The carpet was fairly new as was the flat screen Tv. The exterior of the property is very lush with tons of flowering plants. (The best part) The gentleman working the front desk at check in was kind and professional. I do not plan on revisiting. I need the comfort of cleanliness.

Summary Heading: This is a fine motel for a motel?
Summary: Yes if you an adult. There is a pub foots steps from your door. Loud foot steps!! Loud people. Loud inside the rooms. This motel is not a sanctuary for peace and quiet. The bedspread burn marks and skid marks prove me right.  Speaking of which the bed is (my newly invented word) motelishly comfortable. The pillows don't need stacking unless that's your thing. The carpet was vacumed. The showers have soap, pressure, hot water, and towels. BYOShampoo with conditioner. I hope you bring a swimsuit to use in the sauna, please! The televisions are nice, especially the suites set. There WiFi works well. The printer is in the lounge. Get there in time for happy hour check in. If you see me, smile and say hello. This is our motel.
The service & breakfast @ Super 8 was great!  I felt that the rooms needed to be made over to give it more of a new feeling.

I felt dirty just staying in this room! Microwave didnt work, mini-fridge did not work, murphy bed was extremely uncomfortable (why would a motel even have a murphy bed?), room smelled terrible AND got woken up in the morning to a guy yelling about a hooker in the room next door taking his money. I'd recommend paying the extra money and staying somewhere else. the one positive aspect was the service at the front desk was great. very friendly.

Summary Heading: Spend the extra money to stay elsewhere.
Summary: The room was a good size. However, it smelled like cat urine and the carpet was filthy. The staff was friendly enough. A continental breakfast was a good perk. Fortunately, we were only there 8 hours to sleep before moving on.
The Bed was clean the towels were good The Shower head did not operate  The Check in was good  The Parking area needs a clean up The furniture needs some upgrade The carpets need replacement

I checked in very late, once I un-packed I started to notice little issues with the rooms cleanliness  and a stale odor in the room, I did not report that night but i did mention it to the front desk staff the next morning. If I had not arrived so late I would have requested to be moved.

After reading the reviews on this hotel I was excited about staying. I was on business and it was a mole away from my client. When I checked in the door keys didn't work. I found that all of them had an issue. I was assured that they would be fixed by the second day but they weren't. Every time I left my room I had to have the desk person let me back in. It was a real inconvenience. They offered no compensation other than an apology. The young man at the desk was as accommodating as he could be running around letting people in their rooms. I felt bad for him. He was great but I won't stay their again. I requested a non smoking room but didn't get one. Bad experience.

Summary Heading: I have stayed here a few times and the rooms have been...
Summary: I have stayed here a few times and the rooms have been nice.  This time they were pretty full up and the room had a fold up bed.  It was decent, but the King size beds are much better.  Great location and good value.

The Hotel is simple, but really nice. It has everything you need for a short stay. Room is clean and has a nice space, breakfast was ok and Staff was helpful and kind. Only issue is the room lightining, which was very poor.

Summary Heading: Great Staff and a Good Deal!
Summary: Hotel is easy to find and though the decor is a bit dated, it is super clean and the staff is very friendly and helpful!  Good price and value. Fruit, cereal, waffle breakfast included. Lots of stores nearby if you need anything and easy to get to from the freeway.
If they cleaned the carpet, fixed  the broken chairs, Aired the room out I would come back. Nice room

Summary Heading: Was pleasantly surprised to find them providing snack...
Summary: Was pleasantly surprised to find them providing snack refreshments early evening. Had no idea this was included.
Carpets were dirty and room smelled like cat litter box. Place is worn. Service friendly. You get what you pay for.

Summary Heading: I would definitely stay here again. The staff is very...
Summary: I would definitely stay here again. The staff is very helpful and courteous and the room was clean. The bed was a bit uncomfortable and I will be bringing my own pillows next time. great place for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate your taking the time to share your stay.  I apologize that the pillows were not to your liking.  If possible, could you reply with your name or room number so that we can take care of this.  Thank you.  John Morrin john_morrin@sbcglobal.net

Summary Heading: Great stay.  Bed, pillows and environment comfortable...
Summary: Great stay.  Bed, pillows and environment comfortable, clean & very nice. Service and amenities great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with our friends on TripAdvisor.  We're really appreciate your taking the time to offer your thoughts on our facility.  Thanks again.

Summary: I wound up needing a motel last minute and after searching around on yelp found that there was little available. They could only give me a room for the night, but were nice enough to put me on the wait list for another and sure enough someone cancelled the next morning and the clerk the next morning was not only helpful and knew just what the score was, but remembered my name after only meeting e once. Rooms are updated and clean, flat screens and a decent selection on cable, strong wireless signal. The continental breakfast if nothing fancy but it's a lot more than you get at most places and has a make-your-own waffle bar; they also have complimentary snacks and refreshments in the afternoon. There are also plenty of options for food if you don't mind walking two blocks, and a
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay at our Super 8 on TripAdvisor.  We're really glad that we were able to accommodate you and get you in at this very busy time.  We look forward to seeing you again should your travels bring you back to our area.  Thanks again!

Summary: This Super 8 had a FREE wine/soda bar in the evenings with appetizers.  it was boxed wine, but seriously, who would've guessed that?!  I am rarely surprised (in a positive way) with hotels/motels, Thanks Super 8 for completely surprising us with an unexpectedly great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your stay with our friends on TripAdvisor.  We take great pride in trying to exceed our guests expectations both in service and accommodations.  Thank you for choosing our Super 8 in Costa Mesa.  We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: Not a place to stay a second time
Summary: I reserved a room for my 18-year old daughter and her friends. They did not have a credit card. I called the hotel and explained the situation ahead of time. I was told that there won’t be any problems as long as the girls pay a deposit of $50. Once the girls arrived, the hotel refused to honor the reservation. It was a long struggle to have them check in. A different price was finally charged, when our daughter paid cash (the only option as they refused to honor the credit card). The manager never explained why his staff does not know that one cannot check in without a credit card. He only clarified, after I asked him several times via email, that he had to charge more for the room because four people were staying.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for sharing your daughter's stay at our Costa Mesa property.  I am sorry about the confusion with the check-in process and payment method that she encountered upon arrival.  If possible, I would like the opportunity to discuss this with you directly as I beleive it was basically a misunderstanding.    Sincerely,   John Morrin john_morrin@sbcglobal.net 714-879-4920 ext. 201

Summary: We stayed in this motel for one month and we didn’t have any problem while stay. Wonderful service. Staff were kind and friendly especially the motel manager was really helpful to us. Our request came through quickly. Free wifi was also nice.  Kids loved the pool so much and enjoyed free movies. The room was big and clean. Nice breakfast and evening snack.  The motel location was easy access to any shops, restaurant and beaches. Public golf course was just round the corner.  Only wish I had was if there was laundry room in the motel but coin laundry was close enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review on our Super 8 in Costa Mesa.  We're glad that you and your family were able to take advantage of some of the complimentary extras that we offer. I hope that you did not overlook the recently added complimentary DVD library and players available to all of our guests. Thanks again!

Summary: We had a very nice experience at the Super 8 in Cost Mesa. We have stayed here before and we will continue to stay here. The rooms are clean and quiet too.The evening wine time is nice too. The continental breakfast is very nice and always plenty of food with a great selection. Edgar is great at the front desk. It would be nice to see more shuttles to and from the motel in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our Super 8 on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate your confidence in returning when your travels bring you to our area.  At this time, we are only running the shuttle during the Orange County Fair.  I was incorporated to accommodate some of the many Fair vendors that stay with us.  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: had a great time, the amenities at this location are...
Summary: had a great time, the amenities at this location are excellent. Only downfall is that i got kicked out at 10pm from the Jacuzzi.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our Super 8 on TripAdvisor.  We're glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I'm sorry that you were asked to leave the spa, but as a matter of policy to ensure the comfort of all our guests, the entire pool area is closed at 10:00pm.  We hope to see you again should your travels bring you back to our area.

Summary: Was going to the OC fair on Saturday night so I figured me and my wife would stay close. Enjoyed our stay. Room was clean. Staff was courteous and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Super 8 while visiting the Orange County Fair.  We really are convenient being only minutes away.  Thank you for taking the time to review us on TripAdvisor.  We hope to see you again next time your travels bring you to the area.

Summary: Overall disappointed.  The room I thought I was getting would have included a kitchen area not just a fridge under the TV.  Our additional room had such a toxic smelling emission from the air conditioner that we had to change rooms.  The cable channels listed were not the cable channels on the TV, and at first this was thought to be problem with the cable provider, but ultimately turned out to be, apparently, that the hotel was just no longer purchasing the same channel package, and that was that.  The beds were semi comfortable.  Things were relatively clean, though when we first checked in, we noticed the coffee pod from the last visitor was still in the coffee pot. No one cleaned our room on the second day!  On the positive side, it was very quiet (at least on the second
Manager Response: We appreciate your taking the time to share your stay with us on TripAdvisor.  I would like to apologize that you were dissapointed with your stay and we failed in a number of areas.  I can assure you that this is not what we work towards and I would like the opportunity to discuss your stay with you directly if that would be possible.  Please contact me at your convenience so that I may personally go over the issues mentioned.  Sincerely,  John Morrin john_morrin@sbcglobal.net 714-356-5692

Summary: Great location 5 minutes drive to the beach.  Ideal for a weekend getaway when all you need the hotel room for is to sleep and shower!
Manager Response: Thank you for the reveiw on TripAdvisor.  We really are convenient to the beach and local attractions.  I hope that you were able to enjoy the complimentary breakfast and evening refreshments while staying with us.  Just a couple of the extras that our guests enjoy.  Thanks again!

Summary: Pleasant place, well worth the price.  The adjacent pub is also kinda nice, quite a bonus at such a moderate class property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your stay with our friends on TripAdvisor.  The Pub next door is a popular place to relax with a friendly atmosphere.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to the Costa Mesa/Newport Beach area.

Summary: Excellent location, very close to restaurants and shopping. Our room was large and comfortable. The in room refrigerator and microwave also came in handy for bringing drinks and snacks. We didn't have a chance to use the pool and spa but hope to on our next visit. The continental breakfast had a decent amount of choices to get the day started. The entire staff were extremely nice and helpful. We will definitely stay at this Super 8 again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your stay with us on TripAdvisor.  The full suite rooms really are nice and comfortable.  Thank you once again and we look forward to having you as our guest again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Just spent 5 nights at Super 8 in Costa Mesa and was very happy with my entire stay.  The employees at the front desk and the Manager himself were very helpful and friendly.  My boyfriend and I had only booked two nights originally (unfortunately I had the wrong dates booked; off by a week but they were still able to accommodate us), and not knowing the Fair was taking place, after the two nights we thought we would have to find another hotel, after being told Super 8 was booked up for the next few nights. Luckily the Manager (I'm sorry, I don't remember his name) kept us updated and at the last minute there was a cancellation.  We were quite pleased to be able to stay those three additional nights.  The rooms were clean, the breakfast served was fine, and we were able to enjoy
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with us on TripAdvisor.  We're glad that the manager (Edgar) was able to accommodate you for the extra nights.  It does get very busy during the Orange County Fair.  Thank you once again and hope to have as our guest again should your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: This hotel was in a great location, 10 minutes to the beach.  Lots of food choices nearby and shopping too.  The bedding could use and update.  My kids loved that this hotel had a "snack time" in the evening.  Good stay overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for shaing your recent stay with us on TripAdvisor.  We're glad the kids enjoyed the evening snacks and refreshments.  We hope that they also took advantage of the recently added complimentary DVD library and players as well.  Thanks again!

Summary: Nice hotel for the price. Lots of restaurants in the area. Clean, quiet and comfortable. Friendly staff.
Manager Response: We appreciate your taking the time to share your stay with us on TripAdvisor.  We hope to have as our guest in the future should your business or leisure travels bring you to the area.

Summary Heading: Super 8 Costa Mesa was just alright
Summary: Nothing special overall.  My room smelled really bad of cigarettes and no non-smoking room was available.  There was lots of noise from neighboring bar and foot traffic.  Cleanliness and comfort of the room was not to standard.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay on TripAdvisor.  We are sorry if there were issues with people and traffic during your stay.  I hope that you notified the manager on duty at the time so that it could be addressed.  Any issues with cleanliness or comfort are simply not acceptable and we apologize for that.  Again, I hope that we were given the opportunity to address these concerns during your stay.  I would be happy to discuss your stay and concerns with you directly if you prefer.  Sincerely,  John Morrin 714-879-4920 ext. 201

Summary: This is a very family oriented hotel, and the staff was friendly. The issue is there wasn't anyone else available to re-make our bed and remove the hair on the pillows and sheets, so the front desk manager had to come and do it. HE was kind, but, not trained to make the bed. He threw the sheets on and because we already had paid, we let him get back to the front desk. We would appreciate if compensation by way of extra points or a free night would be given us. This was not romantic at all... The breakfast could use more fresh fruit in variety and it was crowded, crowded, crowded, and the set up for cereal on one end, waffle iron far away from butter, caused a lot of confusion.No juice at all and, in the evening.. not enough chips, no popcorn, no fruit,  just water ( 2 bottles).
Manager Response: We appreciate your taking the time to share your stay with us on TripAdvisor.  Please accept my sincere apology that we failed to deliver the level of service and accommodations that we pride on providing all of our guests.  I would like to be given the opportunity to discuss your stay in detail if you would contact me at your convenience.  I look forward to hearing from you.  Sincerely,  John Morrin Office Manager  714-879-4920 ext 201 john_morrin@sbcglobal.net

Summary: As usual everyone was very friendly.  We had a great room with all the comforts of home.  My son likes having a mini kitchen, and being upstairs.  We love that we can walk anywhere from our room, like to dinner, or breakfast, or the market if we need something.  We have been going to this Super 8 for at least 6 years in a row every summer, and my son loves the pool, as do I, it's a perfect size and it's surrounded by lovely trees and pool furniture.  We also love the jacuzzi.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review on TripAdvisor.  We're glad you and your family enjoy our property and appreciate the annual visits over the last 6 years.  We hope you are aware of the recent added amenity that we offer - DVD movie library with complimentary players that are available to our guests.  Thank you once again and hope to see you next year.

Summary: We booked expecting a cheap motel based on the price and were pleasantly surprised. The staff was very helpful, check in and out was very easy. The rooms were neat, nice and well decorated. the fridge in the unit was larger than expected. Beds were comfy and overall I was very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your stay on TripAdvisor.  We do feel that our guests receive a great value with the service and amenities provided.  Thank you once again!

Summary: My husband and I chose the Super 8 Costa Mesa because we knew it was a short drive to Newport Beach.  The room was large, very clean, with a very comfortable bed.  The manager's reception in the evening was nice, and all Front Desk personnel were extremely friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review on TripAdvisor.  We're glad that you enjoyed your stay and that you had the opportunity to take advantage of some of the complimentary extras that are available to our guests.  Stop in and see us again next time you are in the Newport Beach area.

Summary: satisfactory, clean, quiet, nice pool and jacuzzi, convenient to stores and shops, great staff....
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Super 8 in Costa Mesa while traveliong with your family.  We appreciate your taking the time to share your experience with our friends on TripAdvisor.

Summary: We had a nice stay except for the smokers.  They leave their garbage wherever they want, clog the stairwells taking their morning/evening smokes.  This would be an excellent place if the entire property was made smoke free.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay on TripAdvisor.  We apologize for the inconvenience that some of our smoking guests had on your stay.  Although we try to encourage our smoking guests to use the receptacles provided, it only takes a couple to ruin it for others.  Again, we are sorry.

Summary: The room was large and nice and clean.the staff at front desk were very pleasant and helpful. The location was good, handy to Disneyland 1/2 hr drive. Handy to Newport beach also. Continetal breakfast was very good,plenty there to start the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with our friends on TripAdvisor.  The Super 8 does have an excellent location for the Beach, Disneyland and Southern California destinations.  Thank you once again and we hope to have you as our guest in the future should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: We had a a last minute chance to take an overnight trip to the beach and really enjoyed our stay at Super 8 in Costa Mesa the room was large and comfortable and the service was friendly would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Super 8 in Costa Mesa for your recent trip to the beach.  We're glad that you and your family enjoyed your stay.  On the next visit, make sure to take advantage of the complimentary breakfast and evening refreshments as well.  The kids might also enjoy the complimentary DVD movie library and players that are available.  Thank you once again.

Summary Heading: Over all, the room was good. I liked the spaciousness. The...
Summary: Over all, the room was good. I liked the spaciousness. The bedding definitely needed replacement/cleaning...including the blankets & bedspreads. The breakfast was good and sufficient.  We stayed two different nights. The 2nd night ( a different room) the carpet was dirty & not vacuumed...found m&m's on floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for the reveiw on your recent stays at our  property in Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the cleanliness issues noted.  There is no excuse for this and we are sorry for this oversight on our part.  If possible, I would appreciate a note or a call so that I may make certain that these issues have been taken care of.  Thank you once again for bringing this to our attention.  Sincerely,  John Morrin 714-879-4920 ext. 201 john_morrin@sbcglobal.net

Summary: Facility is clean and pleasant; although, some carpets need to be replaced. Edgar, the general manager is pleasant ,efficient and knowledgeable- a real asset to the brand.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property on TripAdvisor.  We have recently begun the process of carpet replacement in rooms.  On a future visit we think you will enjoy the new carpet and thicker padding now being used.  Thank you once again.

Summary: Thanks for the friendly service! Liked the cleanliness except for the soiled carpet. Had to wear socks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay with us.  I hope that the issue with the carpet was communicated with the staff prior to departure.  We apologize for this oversight on our part.  If the staff was not notified of this issue at the time of your stay, I would appreciate a call or a note as to the room so that I can follow up and make sure it has been addressed.  Thanks again.  John Morrin 714-879-4920 ext. 201 john_morrin@sbcglobal.net

Summary: on 2nd level, details we like: plug ins on bedstand, flat screen tv,  separate sinks from toilet/shower area w/ huge counter. awesome location to highways, beaches, disney. we didnt want to leave! oh AND... snack time with wine/soda!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Super 8 in Costa Mesa while traveling with your family.  We hope that you took advantage of the complimentary breakfast as well as evening refreshments.  Were you aware of the recently added DVD library and complimentary players available for use. Another benefit of choosing to stay with us.  Thank you once again.

Summary Heading: Nice property but even nicer Manager
Summary: This Super 8 is somewhat old, but it's in an excellent location.  The Manager, Edgar, is the main reason we keep returning to this motel.  My husband and I have stayed there 4 or 5 times in the last 3 years, with each stay lasting about 1 week, and every time Edgar has been over-the-top kind and professional.  Pool and hot tub were clean, rooms were comfortable, and breakfast was satisfying.  We hope to go back there soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay at our Costa Mesa Super 8.  We appreciate your continued patronage and look forward to having you again as our guest on the next trip to the area.  I will be sure to let Edgar know that his effort has been acknowledged.  Thanks again.

Summary Heading: A comfortable motel at a very economical price
Summary: I loved the comfy recliner and foot stool.  Free Wifi is a plus.  Bed and sheets were comfortable.  Everything was clean and in good repair.  Didn't hear any noise. Small refrigerator.  Breakfast included fresh fruit and oats, but sometimes they ran out or there was not much (of these healthy options) to choose from. There was a jogging trail going past the golf course next door.  I felt safe and secure.  A good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent stay with your family.  It's great that you took advantage of some of the complimentary extras that are offered.  We hope that you enjoyed the evening snacks and refreshments as well as the recently added DVD library and complimentary players that are available.  Thank you once again.

Summary: The metal label on the front door said "Non Smoking", but WOW...when we opened the door to our room it reeked of smoke and other scents!!  One of the bed spread had several cigarette burns and so did the carpet.  Also noticed a problem with "ladies of evening" floating around!!
Manager Response: We appreciate your bringing the issues with the nonsmoking room to our attention.  I hope that you gave this information to the staff during your stay.  If not, I would appreciate your contacting me with your room information so that this can be addressed immediately.  We apologize for this oversight.  John Morrin 714-879-4920 ext. 201 john_morrin@sbcglobal.net

Summary Heading: Worst stay ever Rude Front Desk Personnel
Summary: Rude front desk people, breakfast isold and stale, rooms smell. To get back and forth from the hotel you must make a u turn there is no turn lane into the hotel.
Manager Response: I am truly sorry to hear about how disappointed you were with your recent stay with us.  I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss the issues noted directly if possible.  Please give me a call or drop an email as to when it might be convenient for me to call you, so that we could discuss your stay with us.    Sincerely,  John Morrin Executive Offices 714-879-4920 ext. 201 john_morrin@sbcglobal.net

Summary: best in costa mesa. big rooms ,no pet smells. decent breakfast and nice outdoor pool ,sauna and hot tub. great location too.walk to vons or 7-11  again best place on harbor for the money .
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our Super 8 on TripAdvisor.  It really has a convenient location with access to eateries and stores all within a short walk.  We're glad that you had the opportunity to enjoy the amenities listed.  Hopefully, you also took advantage of the evening snacks and refreshments.  Complimentary movies and DVD players are available as well!

Summary: Was an ok stay, Beds are super Comfy, Carpets have got to go, Very dingy, Shower and Bathroom need updated, And the mat at the bottom of tub was nasty even though it's for safety!  Over all a good stay for 2 nights, If  things listed above were to be replaced I would stay again! Check in was great, Had issued but the guy there fixed us up right away!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to bring your concerns with room condition to our attention.  We are in the process of renovation and are updating and replacing the issues noted.  I am sorry that your room had not been updated at the time of your stay.  Thank you once again.

Summary: I'm definitely pleased that I read the TripAdvisor reviews for this motel. The price is half what we're spending for our other hotels during our California trip. Clean room, comfortable bed, typical breakfast, handy location, excellent service. My husband was disappointed that the hot tub was closed (at 10, as posted), and the key cards were touchy. Kudos to William at the front desk-what a charming young man.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review on TripAdvisor.  I will be sure to pass along the service acknowledgement to William.  We take pride in providing great value to all of our guests.  Thanks again.

Summary: I would recommend this place.  We were looking for a reasonable place to stay so we could spend more on entertainment and this fit our needs.  The manager was fantastic and we decided not only would we commend this place but we would return.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review on TripAdvisor on your recent stay with us while traveling with your family.  We appreciate you for choosing our property while vacationing in the Huntington Beach area.  We hope to see you again on a return visit.

Summary: Was in a good location. Their WiFi was barley even considered internet. I had to re-log in more then 15 times an hour. The spa was below bath temperature although the heated pool was nice. Ran out of many breakfast items and when asked to refill was told there was no more. One of our room keys did not work even after being replaced. Seems like front desk care little about the job and more about texting or reading the paper.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing these items to our attention.  We have been working on the internet issue and will be inreasing the bandwidth this week so that this will be resolved shortly.  There is no excuse for the issues with the spa temperature and breakfast supplies.  We are sorry for this and if possible, I would appreciate the  opportunity to discuss this directly with you at your convenience.    Sincerely,  John Morrin Executive Offices 714-879-4920 ext. 201

Summary: Very nice room very clean and the shower worked excellent. Nice flat screen, but the mattress was a little old and worn could have been more new.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with us on TripAvisor.  We appreciate your choosing our property while on business in Costa Mesa.  Thanks again.

Summary: This is my 2nd time staying here and it was great again. The staff was very friendly and helpful, the room was clean, the pool area and the grounds were in excellent shape and well cared for. They even had a DVD player that they provided to us to hook up to the TV and a large assortment of DVD's to watch for free. The breakfast was very nice. The location can not be beat-only about 15 minutes from the Huntington Beach pier and Main Street.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to our Super 8 on your recent visit with your family.  It really is well located for trips to the beach, Disneyland and all of the southern California attractions.  Thank you once again and hope to see you in the future should your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary Heading: Good night's sleep in a clean, comfortable room for a great price
Summary: The title basically says it all. Nothing about this place blew me away, but what matters most to me is the comfort and cleanliness of the room and the quality of my sleep, and this Super 8 hit the mark very well in that regard. Add to that it's relatively low price for a room, and that makes it a pretty fantastic value in my opinion. The main reason for the "Very Good" rating instead of "Excellent" was that there were some issues with our reservation. Somehow they had both the wrong payment info and the wrong room type associated with our booking, and we lost a good half hour or so of sleep sorting it all out after we arrived. I'm not sure whether it was the fault of Super 8 or of Kayak.com, but either way, I feel like it probably could have been resolved in a bit more timely of
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with our friends on TripAdvisor.  We are sorry about the reservation mixup with Kayak.  We encourage our guests to book directly with the property as this seems to avoid the issues that the automated 3rd party websites occasionaly encounter.  Thank you once again and hope the you and your friends will stop to see us again when visiting the Costa Mesa/Newport Beach area.

Summary: The stay was pleasant. The pool and hot tub was good. The price for a beach area in orange county was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Super 8 while getting away to the beach for the weekend.  We're glad you enjoyed our accommodations.  We hope that you include us on future weekend beach plans this summer.  Please be sure to make an advanced reservation as we are forcasting a busy summer season.  Thanks again.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay. We have used this hotel for the last 4...
Summary: Great place to stay. We have used this hotel for the last 4 years when we stay in Costa Mesa. Always clean, quiet and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for the past 4 years of choosing our Super 8 while on business in Costa Mesa.  We truly appreciate your patronage.

Summary: The place looks very unassuming from the street but it's a well-run, clean place and the people who work their are exceedingly nice. Well done!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAvisor.  We're glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope your will consider us on a future visit.

Summary: We had a pretty bad experience at this motel. It hasn't been renovated in a long time and not maintened well either. Carpets in our room were old and stained... Both floor and desk lamp didn't work. We couldn't get our TV set to work nor DVD player. In the lobby, just where the breakfast area is, two loud, annoying AC units blowing right at us. There was no iron in our room. The lady at the reception desk told me to come and get it. Then I waited there frustrated in line... then I started complaining pointing out all the things that were not working...she told me not to give her an attitude...ended up arguing with her... The whole experience was depressing, I will never return there or recommend it to anyone. Bye...
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for bringing your concerns and disappointment on your recent stay with us.  If possible, I would like to discuss the issues mentioned with you at your at your convenience if possible.    Sincerely,  John Morrin 714-879-4920 ext.201

Summary Heading: The seminar I was scheduled to attend was cancelled so I...
Summary: The seminar I was scheduled to attend was cancelled so I didn't stay.  I was unable to cancel my reservation with you, so I have no rating.  I rate your policy a zero because there should be an exception for those who's circumstances are beyond our control.  I would have stayed if the class wasn't cancelled.  I always stay with Super 8, but I think I'll stay somewhere else on my next trip to feel in a way that we can call it even.
Manager Response: We appreciate your taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor.  It is our general practice to allow guests to cancel under circumstances as you described.  Unfortunately, we have no control over reservations made on third party websites such as Hotels.com, Priceline etc.  Although there may be convenience associated with these sites, they have rules and policies that are in fact beyond our control.  That is why we encourage guests to book directly with our location, so that we can give the service and consideration that automated sites fail to employ.  We are sorry for this, but hope you will give us the opportunity to illustrate why we are one of the highest rated properties on TripAdvisor for our area.  We hope that you will give us a try should your event reschedule.

Summary: My stay in this Super 8 was really great. Good spacious rooms (I had smaller in Marriott). Nice continental breakfast (great waffle maker!) clean swimming pool with saline water, Jacuzzi (I don't like Jacuzzis, but judging from other people sitting in that one for hours must be great). Wonderful service, Conveniently located.
Manager Response: We appreciate your staying at our Super 8 while on business in Costa Mesa.  It's great that you were able to take advantage of the breakfast and pool area.  I hope that you enjoyed the complimentary evening refreshments and snacks as well.  Thanks again.

Summary: Served the purpose during a conference that I attended.  It was roomy, clean, comfortable, had a flat screened cable TV, and wi-fi.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Super 8 in Costa Mesa on your recent business trip to the area.  We're glad that you found the services and amenities accommodating to your needs.  We hope that you had the opportunity to enjoy the evening snacks and refreshments, and complimentary morning breakfast  as well.  You might consider taking advantage of the complimentary DVD player and movies on future visits.  Thank you once again.

Summary: I stay in hotels 300 days out of the year. That being said, I used to love this hotel. This time around it was not so great. Our room was dirty and smelled like urine. Front desk staff on the night we checked in was a young lady that was rude and obviously hated her job. One thing I loved about this hotel was it's heated pool and hot jacuzzi. When we pulled in to the hotel I got excited as it was advertised on the sign that they had a heated pool, sauna, and jaccuzi. After we checked in I quickly hurried to my room to change into my suit. I went out to the pool area to find 'out of order' sign and the whole area locked up. I was so dissapointed. It is really the only redeeming quality that this hotel has, and without it, it was just kind of sad and run down.
Manager Response: I would like to apologize that we failed on multiple levels regarding your recent stay with us.  It was unfortunate that the day the pool was down for maintenance coincided with the date of your stay.  It is back up and open.  As far as the demeanor of the staff member mentioned this is totally unacceptable.  A management conference with the employee is scheduled to see that this does not happen in the future.  I would be happy to address your stay with us directly if you would like to contact me at your convenience.  We do appreciate your taking the time to bring your concerns to our attention. Summary: Close to everything.. Great Location.. Parking good.. Front Desk manager was really nice.. we showed up 2 hours prior to our reservation and he was more than happy to get us our room as soon as possible... all was good  no problems.. Will stay there again when I travel to California
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Super 8 while in Costa Mesa and we're glad that it worked out well for you.  We would enjoy having you back again should you be in the area, but should you find yourself in the Long Beach area, we operate that property as well.  We think you will find it equally accommodating.  Sincerely

Summary: Great Location for us, close to Family, Beaches, Amusement parks etc...I like how the Property sits BACK from the very busy hwy and is exceptionally quiet & almost peacefull while still being in the middle of a very large town! nice pool & hot tub & sauna!  Nice staff except for One morning desk agent that was ALWAYS too busy sitting on His Butt texting to Help, clean, make coffee or do his Job! ( Very unproffesioanal ) but overall I like this property very much, good value and product for the Buck! will come back & do reccomend it.....
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Costa Mesa property while traveling with family in Orange County.  We also appreciate the staff review as well.  We use all reviewer comments as a tool to improve our efforts to better serve our guests.  Thank you

Summary Heading: better than i was expecting and Edgar on reception is a star!
Summary: I've been traveling through the US for 5 weeks so far. I'm on a budget due to my trip being a 3 monthy one. This is the 6th similar style and similar budget hotel I've stayed in and this is easily the best so far. For a start, the rooms are very spacious and clean. Pool, sauna, and jacuzzi are all impeccably clean. The star of the show though, has to be EDGAR on reception. I turned up a bit flustered, early and with a bunch of bags. He could see staight away, I wasn't happy but just very calmly took care of everythig. I'm not one for writing reviews but with this guys above and beyond attitude was awesome!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our Super 8 on TripAdvisor.  We're really glad you enjoyed your stay and hope the rest of your trip goes well.  Thanks again!

Summary: This was the second stay in 3 years! We returned because our first stay was great. We were not disappointed this time as well. My wife and I enjoyed the clean room, great continental breakfast and happy hour. The location is close to everything! We would stay here the next time we are in CA.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review on Tripadvisor.  We appreciate your return visit.  We get alot of return guests and referrals as well.  Thanks again and hope to see you next time should your travels bring you Orange County.  Sincerely

Summary: Staff was friendly and the room clean.   Enjoyed the breakfast with freshly made waffles.  The only issue we came across was the smoke alarm battery started beeping in the middle of the night so we called room service.    They tried to fix it and I finally asked them to leave and take the smoke alarm with them.   ] Overall all a nice couple of days and only 20 mins from the cruise ship terminal in Long Beach
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our Super before taking off on your cruise from Long Beach.  We're sorry about any inconvenience the issue with the smoke detector may have caused.  We hope the rest of your vacation goes smoothly.  Sincerely

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights and found the front desk and maid service very good . the breakfast buffet was fine, my wife liked the make your own waffles .and there was a good selection of other items to choose from . i also liked that a news paper was put outside the room door in the morning . the hotel is in a good location with plenty of restaurants close by  we would definitely stay here again .
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with TripAdvisor travelers on your recent stay with us in Costa Mesa.  Many of our guests really appreciate the USA Today delivered to thier door at our properties.  Nice way to start the day.  Thanks again.

Summary: the pillows were sweat stained. see other comments re: handicapped issues mentioned before.  the female desk clerk was somewhat surley at check in and told me we had to pay up front not that our account would not be debited at check out...felt like maybe we were checking into a short time hotel.  Never had this happen before
Manager Response: We appreciate your taking the time to post issues regarding your recent stay at our Costa Mesa property.  We're sorry that  we were not able to provide the high level of service and accommodations that you deserve.  There may have been some confusion regarding settlement with a debit card.  I would be happy to discuss this or any of the concerns with your stay if you would like to contact me at your convenience.  Sincerely,  John Morrin Executive Offices 714-879-4920 ext. 201

Summary: My I phone was stolen in the dining area in the Hotel. The phone was on the table,I got up to refill my coffee and when I went back to my table, It was gone.It was only a matter of seconds. There wasn't any body in the front desk.The manager was making coffee. I've been coming here 6 years,I've never have any problems.I guess it could happen any  where.Maybe the manager should stay at the front desk at all times and keep an eye on things,let someone else make the coffee and clean.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that you had your phone taken while in the breakfast area.  We will make sure that all of the staff are aware of this.

Summary: The motel was convenient to the OC Fair Grounds, beach and restaurants. The grounds are very beautiful and clean. Parking was an issue for late arrivals due to the pub that shares the lot, as well as small spaces. The staff was kind and courteous, however it would've been nice to see there name on a name tag rather then the need to ask them. I have never stayed at a Super 8 due to there reputation and now I"ve fully experienced it. Dirty rooms. Blood stain on blanket under old, worn out bedspread. Cobwebs covered in dust hanging over the vanity. Pubic hairs lined the outdated tub and bathroom floor. Newer carpet still showed many dark stains. (Keep flip flops on!) Heavy dark window covering made it impossibe to crack a window for fresh air. The room was quiet and my mattress
Manager Response: I would like to to thank you for rating our property on Tripadvisor.  We use all guest ratings and suggestions as a tool to assess our strengths as well as areas where we have not met and exceded your expectations.  We would like to address your concerns further.  If you would consider contacting me directly, I would truly appreciate the opportunity to discuss the issues with your stay.  Sincerely,  John Morrin Executive Offices 714-879-4920 ext. 201

Summary Heading: I stayed here in 2 different rooms on 2 separate nights so I got a good cross section of what the rooms will look like.
Summary: I stayed here after staying at the neighboring Motel 6 with the new modern European styling remodeling decor.  I was more comfortable here than at the other place.  This location obviously is a older hotel that has seen several remodels and refurbishments.  The quality and craftsmanship of the last refurbishment was moderate to okay.  A high grade deep pile carpet will greet you when you enter the room.  You may also notice a slightly musty odor.  The first room I stayed in had a very poorly cleaned carpet that was badly spotted and stained.  The second room was okay in condition but it could have used a shampooing.  Fixtures counters and paint were all adequate to okay.  No flat screen TV but a great selection of cable channels. A hi carb breakfast will meet you in the morning
Manager Response: Good morning and thank you for sharing your thoughts on your stay at our Costa Mesa Super 8.  We are in the process of replacing carpet and furniture where needed.  Thank you once again for choosing our Super 8.  Please do not hesitate to contact me if you would like to discuss your  stay or if I may be of assistance in a future reservation.  Sincerely,  John Morrin Executive Offices

Summary Heading: Good choice for our So Cal trip
Summary: Very large king room that worked well for our 2 night stay while visiting in So Cal.  A good value - nothing fancy but it is clean and in a good location right off the 405 with a nice pool and spa.  They had a good selection of continental breakfast fare - including hot waffles and they even hosted an evening happy hour with snacks.  Our room was on the opposite side of the property away from the "Pub" and was very quiet and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on your recent visit to our Costa Mesa Super 8 location.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you while traveling through the area in the future.  John Morrin Executive Offices

Summary: Stayed here for a couple of nights. Reading many other reviews I think we may have stayed at a different hotel! We felt the staff were friendly enough - they offered help when requested. Rooms were clean and tidy, albeit somewhat dated. Coffee, fridge, TV, microwave, air con, etc. In the evenings there was a basic 'happy hour' with nibbles and wine in the reception. (Wine from a polystyrene cup is not great though!) Breakfast was fine - the usual buffet of pastries, pancakes, cereals, juice, etc. Free DVD's were available - unusually you were given the player as well as the disc, but no problem with this. The swimming pool was good, as was the hot tub. Parking was fine.  The only negatives really was the motel is easy to miss when you arrive - its next to 7/11 store, and there
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with us on Tripadvisor.  If your travels bring you to the area in the future, please consider sending me a note on dining preferences and I would be happy to offer suggestions that are close but easy to miss.  Sincerely,  John Morrin Office Manager

Summary: My stay was 7 days.  Check-in was easy, nice person on duty.  This motel is located next to a "Pub", I would say "connected" to the motel. My room was downstairs, steps away from the "Pub" and 3 nights were extremely noisey all night, so sleep was difficult.  Room was 'ok', livable, but could use some TLC/updating and better cleaning by maid.    Rates were cheapest around, would consider another visit.

Summary Heading: Not as nice as I remembered
Summary: In returning here two years after my first day, I was looking forward to it. I'd had a great experience at this motel the first time my friend and I stayed here: great location, service and an impressive room. Maybe it was the room we were put in, but this was definitely a step down: plugs without face plates, spider webs in the shower, vague unpleasant smoky smell, bed linens in need of replacement (not dirty, just cheap and tired).   Breakfast was still a good value and the front desk service was fine (minus a lack of information when a transformer blew). The location is still great if going to the beach or the OC Fair, but the room left a lot to be desired and needed to be spruced, definitely.   Maybe it's just time for a remodel?   Overall, if I were to return, I might look

We made Costa Mesa our base for visiting Disneyland (25 mins) and Newport Beach (15 mins).  It was a good value for the money - clean, friendly and well run.  The staff were very warm and helpful.  Breakfast was basic, but met our needs.  (If you're looking for bacon & eggs, you'll have to go elsewhere).  The pool was lovely - but too bad it didn't open till 10.  (It's open till 10 pm for night owls, but that's not helpful for kids.)  I'd stay there again if visiting the area.

Summary Heading: A bargain for a large clean room
Summary: We spent 2 nights here in early June. I booked a rate directly on the Super 8 website for $61/night.  The hotel is easy to find and near a Vons grocery store. Parking available directly outside the office. Rooms are outside entry. My room was large with a fridge. Jetted tub in bathroom. Housekeeping was prompt and freshened our room nicely. The hotel was quiet and we slept well. Plenty of cable channels if you need tv.  Pool and hottub were clean and not crowded while I was there. Open 10am to 10pm. Chairs and loungers around for seating.   Towels were not your regular hotel towels. They seemed to be of a higher quality.   The morning comp breakfast is average and what you would expect. Waffles, cereal, fruit danish, bagels, bread for toast, milk, juice.   Free wifi which worked

Summary Heading: great place and lots of free extra's!
Summary: When arriving at this place we had trouble with our booking and felt a little stressed. After some time the receptionist called his manager and it was sorted out.  The hotel has a good breakfast (compared to other motels) free WiFi, free wine and snacks between 5-8, free use of computer, great heated pool, a lovely hot tub. Our room was very clean and spacious. Surrounding area had shopping and bars. It's about an hours walk from the beach.  We would highly recommend this hotel to everyone.

Summary Heading: Rental Car Windshield Smashed and People Fighting
Summary: First time in a Super 8, sadly I was disappointed. There is a bar next door and on weekend nights there are tons of rowdy drunk people. First day there it was fine, 2nd day I woke up I found my rental car windshield smashed with a brick, it was parked in Super 8's parking lot. The brick was laying next to the car and there were brick powder on the windshield. I went to the staff they said there is nothing they can do and tell me to call the police. I called the police and filed a police report, he asked me if I had any road rage incident or had any bad blood between somebody I know, I said no, no road rage incident and I am from Michigan I don't even know anybody in California. He looked at the security recordings later and figured out it was people from the bar the night before

We stayed here for 3 weeks on and off while working in the area. I love this hotel. I have stayed in hotels continously for 3 months straight and this is by far my favorite. The pool is clean and heated, huge plus. The jacuzzi is the hottest I have felt at a motel and they also have a sauna. The rooms are typical for a super 8. Clean, good maid service, and lots of channels to choose from. They have a nightly happy hour of box wine and snacks, which is totally above and beyond. Not only would I stay here again on a work related trip, I would also come back for a pleasure stay. Lots of places to eat in the area and newport beach is real close!

Summary Heading: Still My First and ONLY Choice in Costa Mesa.
Summary: OK, I strayed and tried the recently remodeled Motel 6 on Newport Blvd.  Wow, what a waste of money!. $10 more; hard beds, razor-thin pillows; no breakfast and a less than desirable clientele!  I returned to the Super 8 the next night and once again I reiterate all of my previous extremely positive comments. I couldn't believe the one negative review on Trip Advisor. What a snob! If you want plush, go to the Marriott and pay your $200 a night! As for me, I choose the excellent staff,facilities, clean rooms, free breakfast and evening snacks, free movies and dvd's, excellent pool, spa and sauna for a VERY reasonable AAA or AARP price. My only suggestion continues to be to replace the uncomfortable murphy beds with standard beds. One other nice experience has been meeting the

I concur with the review from mikiecycle (two-stars: "Dubious quality...".  It used to be a good bargain but my most recent stay was very sub-par.  I also was put in a non-smoking room next to other non-smoking rooms with cigarette butts all around & ashtrays on the air-conditioning units.  I don't know what kind of idiot asks for a non-smoking room just to smoke out front; or why the management allows this as they obvious knew about it (i.e. one day there was no ashtray and cig butts all around; the next day obviously a maid had left an ashtray for them).  I complained to the management and they just said "it's their right to smoke outside if they want - we can't tell them not to as long as it's not in the room."  Needless to say, smoke would seep into my room through the air

We recently  stayed at Super 8 We normaally stay at the holiday Inn or Marriott but we read the reviews  prior to arriving  and decided to give it a try   we were not dissappointed My  mother and  I ESPECIALLYliked the complementary breakfast and wine and snacks served in the evening The rooms and the bathrooms were very clean and the beds were  comfortable We had my son's birthday party next door at Patrick's Pub and all had blast the only problem we had was  with the keys the magnectic strip wasn't working so we had to get a total of 4 keys  but Edgar was very helpful  All in All we had a  wonderful stay Thank you to all your staff I will stay there agian

Summary Heading: surprised, best motel in costa mesa!
Summary: during the process of my apartment getting ready for my wife, our little boy, and myself to move in, we needed a place to stay.  we found that this motel had good reviews so indeed stayed until our apartment was ready to move in. Edgar the manager was king enough to provide us with a weekly rate which really helped us out since we had a budget to follow. I can't express much more than all the good reviews this hotel has already gotten,the entire staff was very helpful, Robert and Pablo were great! theirs a nice welcoming feeling this place gives you, we felt treated more as family than just guests. its very hard to see how this place would get negitive reviews or low scores,its the best motel i've stayed in by far! There's is a bar on site but didn't seem to bother us a bit, for

Summary Heading: Dubious quality lodging adjacent to a bar
Summary: I chose Super 8 Costa Mesa on the basis of TripAdvisor reviews, and am still scratching my head about the discrepancy between the generally positive reviews and what my wife and I found there.    The motel is on very busy Harbor Blvd.; getting to places north of it (for example, I-405 and I-5) requires cutting across three lanes of heavy traffic to make a U-turn.  There is a bar (Patrick’s Pub) on the north part of the property that shares the parking lot in front of the lobby.  But most motel parking is in an interior area between two buildings (see Google maps), which seems pretty safe.  We were told by a clerk that the north side of the facility (shared with the pub, which has an outdoor patio) is noisier than the south side, so we stayed on the south side.  But we discovered

We read other reviews about how good this motel was so we took a chance and we were stunned. It's all they said and more.  It's clean, good location, has an adequate breakfast. The real advantage is the staff. The three front desk men we met were absolutely delightful, accomodating, extremely helpful, even entertaining.  We couldn't have asked for more.

Summary Heading: I had a pleasant stay at this Super 8!
Summary: The manager, Mr. Edgar Cobian, made it a great experience during my stay at this motel.  He is very informative of the motel offerings such as the free breakfast in the morning & evening snacks in the front lobby.  He is ready  and willing to assist guest to make their stay a pleasant one.   Thanks, Edgar!           Sincerely,  Leomar Noble costa mesa

Summary Heading: Best Super 8 I've ever stayed at.... :-)
Summary: Travelers know that you never know what you're going to get when you stay at a Super (i.e. the one in Sand Point Idaho....:-(   This Super 8 however was the nicest one I've ever stayed at.  It didn't hurt that we received a free upgrade to a larger room with a couch, but nevertheless the room was really really nice.  It was clean, quiet, in great shape, and had a really nice shower.  The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful, and they even had an open wine and snack hour in the evening during the football game in the lobby in the evening.(something I didn't partake in, but was a nice touch).  When we complete our trip, we're headed back there for the night before flying out of the John Wayne airport and will probably stay there again on our next visit to Southern Cal.   As

My husband and I stayed here in Sept. 2011, and found this motel to be everything I had researched.  We got senior price.  King bed, non smoking.  The room service was good and everything was clean except the carpet.  We did complain about that.  You wouldn't want your toddlers on it.  I still give it 5 stars because the immenities were so good.  The pool was crystal clear and swimmable.  The spa was large and clean.  We were ecstatic about the cedar steam room.  Good food (could use a protein rather than so much carbs).  Good free movies, great staff.

we stayed 3 nights here in late September 2011. We booked more that a month out on the Pre-Paid/Non-Cancelable rate of $209 including tax for the total 3 night stay. The room was clean, neat and tidy. A good breakfast included, free wifi.Plenty of free parking. Polite room and front counter staff.

Summary Heading: good motel if u are just arrived in LA
Summary: We stayed one night in this motel after 20 hours travel from Europe. The complimentary breakfast was Super8 standard (that is quite good in the usa but completely different to western european hotel standard), even if the eggs were still freezed. the motel is close to local eating areas and the rooms were clean and comfortable. only some smell of close (due to the fact they never open the windows and just use A/C). For the money we paid it was well worth it, especially if you are just passing through and u don't want to stay in the confusion of LA or the expensive see side hotels. hunglitton beach pier (famous) is just 10 minute drive.

I stay here and here only when I'm in Costa Mesa. Rooms are ALWAYS clean and decor is fresh. Staff is outstanding. Lobby is spacious, comfortable, entertaining (large wide screen TV) and computer is free if you forgot to bring your laptop. Pool is great (should open earlier and close later tho); jacuzzi is large and clean with strong jets. Oh, and don't forget the dry sauna!!  Breakfast is top-notch; vending machines reasonably  priced. If your room doesn't have a microwave, ask for one-- they're free. Also, the mini-suites with dinettes are great (and relatively inexpensive) and include a second TV.. 7-11 is 100 yards away as is Patrick's Irish Pub, which is actually ON the property.  Many different type of rooms. Only complaint is the room with the queen size Murphy type is

Summary Heading: Nice place, friendly staff, and close to beach.
Summary: I booked this hotel when I read good reviews on tripadvisor. It was a good price and a decent place to get some rest. It was about 7 minutes to the beach and had a happy hour, plus a good breakfast (waffles, fruit, coffee, bagels, etc). The manager was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were a little dated, but they were clean and comfortable. I would stay here again.

Highly recommended.  Large rooms, good breakfast, free DVDs, wine and snacks in the PM, strong wifi, excellent service, very economical.  The staff was exceptionally helpful.  We stayed a total of 7 days visiting family in the area, and plan to return in the future. Two issues: there is no elevator so request a first floor room if you have lots of luggage.  And at leas one up stairs queen room has an uncomfortable fold-down wall bed, but after one night the management moved us and upgraded us to a king room.  They said that they were trying to convince the owner to replace these beds.  Owner, listen to them!

We have stayed at many S8's but this is one of the best. Rooms are comfortable with computer desk and a table with chairs to eat at if you wish. The spa tub is one of the best jets and air work great very relaxing! Pool is great too. Internet worked great too. Only negative was no microwave but we didn't need one it did have a fridge with freezer. Staff very accommodating. Many resturants and attractions nearby. All-in-all a great value. We will come back. Even had a free happy hour in the lobby with snacks and wine.

Summary Heading: Decent, economical accomodations near Newport Beach.
Summary: We did an overnight at the Super 8 after attending a Wedding cruise out of Newport Harbor. The room was clean and spacious, with a nice TV and fridge. King bed was hard and pillows and blankets were meager. Bathroom and shower were very clean and well functioning, spacious sink area. Staff was friendly and efficient. Continental breakfast in AM was good.

Summary Heading: For the Price, Tough to Beat
Summary: Perfect? No. Luxury? No. Value? You Bet: Good luck finding a better deal. For less than $70, a very quiet and comfortable night's sleep, table and two chairs, leather "reclining" chair, fridge and micro, and a pool.  A reasonable complimentary breakfast, complimentary beverages (including inexpensive wine) and snacks upon arrival, complimentary copy of Time magazine. You want fancy, pay more. You want value and to be treated well, stay here. I pondered 5 stars, for the price; I'd lean hard toward 4.5 stars.

Clean and adequate. A couple of stains on the floor but for the most part it was a pleasant week's stay. Staff was very friendly and helpful. I wanted to use the hot tub and sauna but the gate was locked and I didn't bother to ask to have it unlocked. Breakfast there was a good start to each day. Plenty of shops and restauraunts nearby.

Nice 70's motel that probably hasn't had a makeover since the 70's! Very worn with broken cabinets, a/c that couldn't cool the room on a 75 degree night and blood stains on the walls and curtains. Frequent Harley traffic through the night and a lively beer party in the parking lot at 7AM on a Thursday morning. A friendly Jamacian looking fellow offered herbal remedies for sale in the parking lot also.

This hotel was ideally located for the OC Fair and near restaurant as well as being close to the freeway. The continental breakfast was good for what it was the for the room rate, you can't complain! We even had a whirlpool tub!

Summary Heading: Excellent value for money; clean & convenient
Summary: I booked this hotel through Super8's website at $57/night (one king-bed room) and was pleased with my stay. Pros: The rooms are spacious, non-smoking rooms are actually smoke free. very clean, ac worked well, reasonably quiet, free & fast wifi, pool & jacuzzi, plenty of places to eat within a couple of blocks, friendly staff.  Cons: There aren't any real cons, just things I liked less. For instance, it's a two story motel-style building, so the only window faces the walkway, which made me choose between sunlight and privacy. It's on Harbor Blvd (a busy, arterial street), so not the most picturesque of areas, but it's safe and close to everything. Rooms are a bit dated and unexciting, but if you want updated and exciting rooms, you should pay another $100 and stay at the Red Lion

Summary Heading: Always had enough time for us!
Summary: Edgar Cobian acted as my personal tour guide.  He provided me w/ all information I needed to get all places around LA and San Diego.  He gave me all the information, printed out maps, made recommendations and provided background informations  and made sure I had perfect directions to get to where I was going.    My simple question to him was returned with a wealth of information.  I highly recommend Edgar.

Travelled on August 16, 2010. We chose this location as a layover and because it's close to John Wayne Airport.  Stayed just one night before moving on to Anaheim to be closer to Disneyland.  The booked a room with 2 large queen beds a whirl tub for 63.75 USD through Expedia.    The room was a clean and big enough for 2 adults and 3 small children.  The beds were comfortable but don't expect them to be like the Marriott's. There was also a mini fridge and leather recliner in the room.  The TV was ok but only had a few channels.  The AC was in good condition and quiet.    Frontdesk services was friendly and gave us a late check out.  Free breakfast was included.  We didn't get a chance to use the  pool but it looked well maintained. Lot's of parking space and close to some

My son and I stayed here 4 nights and absolutley loved it! The tub was a whirlpool which was very nice and the room was very clean and comfortable. There were two sinks which my son loved, and the staff was extremely helpful. We decided to stay here for our Disneyland trip and saved a lot of money by staying further from the park, and didn't sacrifice any luxuries. Also the Wifi here was excellent!!  I ran into a coupon at the front desk and we ended up going on a whale watching tour too with Newport Beach Landing, which hadn't been a part of our plans, but turned out to be a great success!   Being a woman traveling alone with my 5 year old son I felt very comfortable in this location, even though there is a pub next door, it seemed like a really chill location that did not
This motel is deffinately worth the money, not far from airport(sna) or newport beach.Clean and comfortable room, descent pool and free breakfast(danish, pastries ,cereal).
This motel has great service, friendly staff, continental breakfast, clean rooms and free internet. Planning on going back next month because it is a very affordable place

Summary Heading: It is what it is ... a nice Super 8
Summary: I mean, it's not a great place, but it is a great value. Not in a lovely part of OC but in a convenient and not dicey part. Cheap bedding and shower tiles but clean. A basic, all-carb breakfast but better than just continental. Careless weekend and evening front desk service but more attentive weekday service. Old but free lobby computer with Internet access. Air conditioning but light scent of cigarettes in our smoke-free room. Bottom line, you get basic digs by Newport Beach at an affordable price.

My husband and I decided to attend the OC FAIR. We also went to the Beach and the Sawdust Festival. The people at this hotel were so helpful the breakfast was great and the price absolutly UNBELIEVABLE. I could not believe they did not raise the price sky high like everyone else. Can't wait to go back this year. Centrally located. Rooms were spotless. Grounds looked great. no complaints.

I stayed at the Super 8 in Costa Mesa for two nights. I was in town for a family event in the area. The hotel's location off of the 405/73/55 was perfect for my needs. I was greeted by a very friendly registration agent who seemed pleased to see me and explained the hotel amenities. The room was clean and comfortable. The bed was especially comfortable. While I would have liked for there to have been a closet door and a door for the washbasin area, since I was traveling on my own this was not an inconvenience. An iron would have been nice. I was not used to the hand-held shower but figured it out fairly quickly. There was no problem parking in the hotel lot (parking is free). The free breakfast included cereal, toast, bagels, muffins, oatmeal, and a make-your-own waffle maker

This was a great little motel, clean, friendly and affordable.  The staff are great, and seem to take great pride in their work.  The manager (Edgar) does an amazing job of making sure you're stay is the best it could be.  They have a really good continental breakfast, and the "Chateaux Cardboard" happy hour was a very pleasant little bonus.  Our room was exceptionally clean and quiet, and the bed super comfy.  We are so pleased we decided not to pay the big bucks for a fancy hotel, this was basic but but worked perfectly for us while we were searching for real estate to buy after being transfered to the LA area with work.  We wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

The water was VERY hot.  The towels were VERY plush.  The pillows were perfect for the side-sleeping traveler.  Hopefully I will get the opportunity to visit Costa Mesa/ Newport Beach area and stay there again.  Very close to shopping and easy access to downtown district.

Summary Heading: Just perfect...I'll stay here every time.
Summary: What a fabulous place. Cheap and extraordinarily cheerful.  Right from the front desk to the maids who changed the rooms. Like a totaly dork, I left my key in the room on two separate occasions and the guy on the front desk (I think his name was Edward) was so sweet.  The room was spacious and clean. TV, fridge and hairdryer all standard and up to scratch. Couple of chairs and a table if you feel like lounging! Bed was large and comfortable and the room was well sound-proofed.  Breakfast was just fabulous. Everything you could want from cereal to toast to muffins to a waffle machine! Coffee, tea, juice and milk as standard.  Likewise with snacks at 5 p.m. And we got our newspaper every day without fail. Drinks machines in the central island if  you're desperate for refreshments.

We stayed one night in this motel. The complimentary breakfast was great, the motel is close to local eating areas and the rooms were clean and comfortable. For the money we paid it was well worth it, especially if you are just passing through.

Summary Heading: Nice Suite but Very Rude Front Desk
Summary: I booked a big suite which was clean and really roomy.  I was pleased with my stay except for the VERY RUDE lady who handled my check out Sunday morning.  She accused me of having more people in my room then I specified.  I informed I had the exact number stay in my room that I claimed.  Friends live nearby so they left their purses & coats in my room before we went to the bar which is next door.  All took cabs home after the bar closed.  Anyways, for younger people..I wouldn't recommend this hotel.  Because of her demeaning attitude, I seriously felt like a 5 year old getting scolded for something I didn't do, I will never stay at a Super 8 again!!

When so many of the other hotels in the Newport Beach/Costa Mesa area can cost $200 a night or more, it was wonderful finding the Super 8 at less than $75 per night, including taxes.  The rooms were large and spotless and the beds were great.  The hotel amenities were also wonderful (pool, continental breakfast, etc.)  While it's still a "Super 8" (i.e., it's not the Hyatt or Hilton), if what you want is a clean, comfortable room to sleep in -- and not a "resort" experience -- you can't beat this hotel!

We stayed here because it was close to the college, which was our reason for going.  The rooms were clean.  The advertised WiFi only had one bar in the rooms and 2 bars in the office.  The staff were nice.  We will probably stay again.

For a star and half hotel, this hotel felt like a 3.5 star.  They have a nice pool, big jacuzzi and a sauna!  The room was clean & spacious, the bed was a King (all for one person) and the personnel was awesome!  Fresh towels, linen and a good room clean every day.  I felt good staying here and would recommend it to anyone.  Oh, and you cannot bet the price!  My only suggestion:  Bring your own pillows if you need fluffy ones =)

I stayed at Super 8 in Costa Mesa for 10 nights in January '06 and I found the motel to be excellent with friendly staff.My room was spacious and clean and it had a large screened TV and a mini-fridge.The motel provided a small continental breakfast and also had internet access which I found to be very useful.The motel also has a pool,steam room and hot-tub the latter of which i found to be an excellent way to unwind at the end of the day.The motel is located on the busy Harbor blvd. but i could not here traffic noise from my room and so it wasn't a problem. Overall,i would definitely stay here again if i was in the area and at $62 (excl. tax) per night it was good value for money.
